name: Cardboard Kids
description:
Cardboard Kids!

A game made for/during GMTK Game Jam 2020 (theme: Out of control)

Ever wondered what it's like to have no parents and crave some cookies? This is the game for you. As 'out of control' as the GMTK jam's theme is, you and your AI-controlled partner in crime will roam the halls of a creepy orphanage, avoiding the strict nun and with an ambition to find any kid's Holy Grail: a cookie. Remember to put a cardboard box on yourself so you don't raise suspicion, and even then, proceed with caution, because the Nun is out to get anybody who sneaks out after 9! And this just happens to be you...

Music and Sound Design by Marek Domagała – YouTube: https://bit.ly/2CoNM0O
